body:
Hey guys this took me about 45 mins to make! Hope you all enjoy it and I will be using this for my future videos! Keep in mind everything is custom and I did NOT use any templates.
►Video Link:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WFylz0SEjJw&feature=youtu.be◄

►Software Used: Sony Vegas Pro 13, Adobe After Effects CC and Adobe Photoshop CC!◄
►♫Music Used: Bangarang-Skrillex◄
►Twitter:https://twitter.com/SpladeCookieMC◄
